Class GameContext

java.lang.Object
com.bitbybit.logging.ObservableGame
com.bitbybit.game.GameContext
public class GameContext extends ObservableGame
The GameContext class manages the overall state and flow of the Jeopardy game. It holds references to the current game state, questions, players, a scanner for user input, and a report generator. It also extends ObservableGame to manage game events and notify observers.

  • Constructor Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • GameContext

      public GameContext(GameState initialState)
      Constructs a new GameContext with a given initial state and a default scanner for system input.
      Parameters:
      initialState - The initial GameState of the game.

    • GameContext

      public GameContext(GameState initialState, Scanner scanner)
      Constructs a new GameContext with a given initial state and a specified scanner. Initializes the report generator with a default text report strategy.
      Parameters:
      initialState - The initial GameState of the game.
      scanner - The Scanner to be used for user input.

  • Method Details

    • notifyObservers

      public void notifyObservers(GameEvent event)
      Notifies all registered observers about a game event and collects the event. If the event is a PlayerJoinedEvent, the player is added to the list of players.
      Overrides:
      notifyObservers in class ObservableGame
      Parameters:
      event - The GameEvent to be processed.

    • getState

      public GameState getState()
      Returns the current GameState.
      Returns:
      The current game state.

      Parameters:
      state - The new game state to set.
